itunes:title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 3
title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 3
description: True forgiveness doesn’t make sense until you have been forgiven by God. In this message, Pastor Rick shares the four things you have to do to truly forgive others. “God has done it all! He sent Christ to make peace between himself and us, and he has given us the work of making peace between himself and others” (2 Corinthians 5:18).
